## AdaptElement.addDependency() method

Adds a dependency for this Element. This Element will wait to deploy until all `dependencies` have completed deployment.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addDependency(dependencies: Handle | Handle[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dependencies | [<code>Handle</code>](./core.handle.md)<code> &#124; </code>[<code>Handle</code>](./core.handle.md)<code>[]</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
